sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {makeStyles} from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import footerAdornment from '../../assets/Footer Adornment.svg'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ footer: { backgroundColor: theme.palette.common.blue, width: '100%', zIndex: 1302, position: 'relative' }, adornment: { width: '25em', verticalAlign: 'bottom', [theme.breakpoints.down("md")]: { width: '21em' }, [theme.breakpoints.down("xs")]: { width: '15em' } }, MainContainer: { position: 'absolute' }, link: { color: "white", fontFamily: 'Arial', fontSize: '0.75rem', fontWeight: 'bold' }, gridItem: { margin: "3em" } })); export default function Footer() { const classes = useStyles(); return (
Home Services Custom Sofware Development Mobile App Development Website Development The Revolution Vision Technology Process About Us History Team Member Contact Us
); }
